entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 in the evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
